name: unmitigated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
complete, often describing something bad or unsuccessful that has no good or positive points: The whole venture has been an unmitigated disaster.

(esp. of something unpleasant or unsuccessful) complete: Her new business proved to be an unmitigated disaster.
